entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse More BS distraction from Mr. Trump ... how about telling us something important, like how you're handling the Covid-19 second wave, since you and your party f"cked up the first wave so badly.  Let's hear your plan for 8/1/20 when Trump's Greatest Depression starts, Mr. Trump.
